Given two sentences and a specific word, determine whether that word is used with the same meaning (sense) in both sentences.

* If the word appears in both sentences and its meaning is the same, output **`same`**.  
* If the word appears in both sentences but its meanings differ, output **`not the same`**.  
* If the word appears in only one of the sentences, consider its use in the other sentence as “identical” and output **`same`**.

| Can I charge this purchase? | The suspect was charged with murdering his wife. | charge | verb meaning “bill” | verb meaning “accuse” | not the same |
